entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Blanc-Sablon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 03:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: ENE 51 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 70. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Monday 23 January 2023
